Key: (...No one's left here, I think?)
(All right, then.)
Phew. I think I can finally relax here.

Every time I'm in class, for some reason a battle
erupts. It's nice that it's lively and all, but I
want some peace sometimes.
Maybe I can nap until the afternoon class.
Oh, Shido-san, is that you?
Whoa, Kurumi?! You're here...

Yes. I was here this whole time. Since before you
came up here, Shido-san.

O-Oh... Um... what were you doing here all by
yourself...

Nothing. I guess I could say I wanted
to be alone...?

I see. Sorry for bothering you...
Do you hear a weird sound?
Beats me...? Maybe you're imagining things.
Huh? You think so?

Anyways, Shido-san, did you have something you
wanted to do on the rooftop?
Me? Well I...
Wanted to be alone.
Wanted to see you Kurumi.

Well, I too... uh, wanted to be alone a bit,
I guess.
I see. Then I will give this place to you.
What... No, it's fine. You were here first.

Don't mind me. It seems like the classroom is
pretty lively, so I'm sure you want some peace
and quiet from time to time.

Y-You understand me? Honestly, I think you're the
first person to understand that.

Hehe... It must be tough. Don't mind me. Just
enjoy the fresh air. I have some business to
take care of, so I'll be leaving.

O-Oh yeah? Thanks... Sorry about that. I'll take
you up on your offer for today.
Good day, Shido-san.

Thanks, Kurumi. It's hard to explain, but it feels
comforting to be with a mature person.
Don't worry about it.
I hear something odd... I wonder what it is.
Of course, I've come to see you, Kurumi.

Oh, is that so? I guess you've come to tell some
jokes.
D-Does it sound... like I'm kidding?
Why, yes. I mean, did you know I would be up here?
Huh? W-Well...

If you've come to see me, then you must know that
I was up here. But that can't be.

I didn't tell anyone that I was going to be here.
And I can guarantee that no one followed me on
my way up the stairs.

H-Hm... I guess you're right. I just said it to go
along with the flow.

Hehe... Shido-san. You still have a long way to
go. I ask you a simple question, and already
you're slipping.
You got me there. Sorry.
But anyways, why don't we talk while you're here?
That's kind of you, but I'll refrain.
Oh.

Hehe... because if I remained here, I don't think
I could hold it in. I'd want to eat you.
Eat me... That wouldn't be good.

Yes. So with that, I bid you a good day,
Shido-san.
Oh hey, Kurumi!

...And she's off. She's always so unfazed by
everything.

But anyways... something sounds weird. I wonder
what it is.

Ah. I'm glad I could spend some time on the
rooftop. I was able to have a relatively
peaceful afternoon.

(I hope this continues even after I get home...
but I'm sure it won't end up like that.)

...I'll rest a bit at the park before
heading home.
I'm sure I can rest here...
Hm?
Is that... Kurumi? What is she doing there?
Awww, kitty. You're so cute.
Gosh... There, there.

Ohhh, what a good widdle kitty you are.
There, there.
Um... Kurumi-san?
*Gasp*!
Sh-Shido-san...?!
...What are you doing?
I-It's not what it seems...! This is...
Huh? That sound... I heard it earlier...
Hm...? Huh? Is that a tail?
Kurumi, you have a tail.
W-Well, um... it suddenly grew...?

I was wondering what that sound was... It was the
sound of your tail moving.

I-It's moving on its own! And besides... ever
since I got a tail, I've been acting weird...
Whenever I see something cute, I can't help it...
So you're reacting to cats...
Ahhhhhh!
Hey, don't move around too much.

"Um... you're not the usual Kurumi I know. Normally
you'd be like... "I'd totally eat a cat," or
something similar."

Sh-Shut up! I'm not doing this because I want to.
My body just...
Haaaaah!
Ohhhh, good girl, good girl, good girl...!
I wonder why...
It's... kind of funny.

Sh-Shido-san. C-Can you not watch me so intently?
I... have an image to uphold.
Yeah... It's totally different now.

I-It's not like that! As I've told you many times,
ever since this tail grew, my body just...
Ah! Not again!
Hey... did you have that tail this afternoon, too?
S-Since this morning.

Were you on the rooftop because you didn't want
anyone to see your tail?

Y-Yes... That was the case, but...! I let my
guard down... Seeing you twice today!
Ahhhhh.

Hm... It seems like, rather than seeing something
cute, your tail moves every time you're happy.
I-I'm not happy.
Haaah!
This thing is rubbing up against me.

I knew it... Every time you're happy, your tail
moves. It must be expressing your emotions.

H-How long do you plan on watching, Shido-san?
P-Please just leave me alone.

Huh? ...But I kind of want to touch and pull on
your tail.

N-No, you can't do such a thing! If you do, I
won't forgive you!

Ah, I thought you'd say no. Oh well... I guess
I'll pretend I didn't see anything, and go
home for the day.
P-Please do!
Nyaaaaan.

Yeah... It was entertaining to see a side of
Kurumi I've never seen before, but I'm starting
to feel sorry for her.
I'll just leave without saying anything...
Nyaaa-nyaaaa.

Man... I sure saw some odd things today. I wonder
what she's going to do. I wonder if her tail will
stay like that.

If it stays, I bet that tail's going to move
around every time something happens.
(She always seems aloof. Aside from that cat.)
Hm? Wait a minute.

When I saw her on the rooftop, I heard sounds.
That means her tail was moving then, right?
(...So Kurumi was happy back then...?)
I wonder why...?
Oh well, I guess I'll go home.
